timeline.message:
Add the CustomizedView Helix property

This commit contains the bare minimum properties for CusromizedView
Helix property.

timeline.bodyText:
I think we discussed that we don't need a state model?
And for replicas, not sure how our customer will be using it. Could you please comment?
